page.title: 02 RELIGION
page.content: It was discovered that most of the people interviewed believed in God,and only a small percentage did not not believe in God.We found out that most of the people were Methodists. 50% prayed at home, 30% prayed in chapel or in church,the rest did not pray at all.The residents did not travel far to worship. The people of the area enjoyed ceremonies performed by the children during Christmas and Thanksgiving. By studying the answers given we believe that the number of worshipers has declined in the area over the years.
